DOC.HEADLINE: MOVING TOWARD PEACE ; VOICES
DOC.TEXT: KING HUSSEIN " Out of all_the days of my life , I do not believe there is one such_as this in terms of the feelings , the emotions relating to a long , long struggle. " " This day is a day of commitment , and this day is a day of hope and vision. " * YITZHAK RABIN " Your Majesty , the entire state of Israel is shaking your hand. " " I would like to . . . tell children on both sides of the border we hope and pray that your life will be different than our. " * PRESIDENT CLINTON " History is made when brave leaders find the power to escape the past and create a new future. " " We must guard against illusions . Dark forces of hatred and violence still stalk your lands . We must_not let them succeed. "
